summary: Continuous real-world farm operations recorded as ground-truth data, including environmental conditions, livestock observation, water management, human labor, rest period, and manual crop maintenance.

proofs.title: Morning Observation of the Last Remaining Duck

integrity_notes: All records are captured as-is without modification.
Absence of production is recorded as valid data.
Human labor and rest are treated as first-class data.
All proofs are time-anchored and sequential.
